task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the expense record has been successfully saved.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "AndroMoney"

After the action, the following popup message(s) were shown and soon disappeared: {'Automatically set your main currency to:USDIf this is not the main currency you use. Please go to Settings to change., AndroMoney'}
Touch on a button that has text "AndroMoney"

The button labeled "AndroMoney" has changed from displaying text to having a content description, indicating a shift in focus to the application's home record interface. Additionally, new widgets such as a dropdown field for "Day" and various buttons related to financial management have been introduced on the current screen. (page changed from AboutUs to HomeRecord)
Touch on a button that has resource_id "fab"

The action of touching the button with resource_id "fab" has navigated the user from the HomeRecord screen to the AddNewRecord screen. In this new screen, a button with content description "Navigate up" has appeared, indicating an option to return to the previous screen. (page changed from HomeRecord to AddNewRecord)
Touch on a button that has text "Category:, Food - Breakfast"

The screen has transitioned to the Category Selection page, where a new textview displaying "Category" has appeared along with a list of category options, including "Food," "Clothing/Beauty," and others, indicating the user can now select a category for their record. Additionally, the previous buttons and textviews related to expense details have been replaced by category-specific options. (page changed from AddNewRecord to CategorySelection)

Jade Green has successfully navigated to the Category Selection page, which is a necessary step for adding a new expense record. However, they have not yet selected a category, which is essential to complete the task. Jade Green needs to touch on one of the category options listed, such as "Food" or "Transportation," to proceed with adding the expense record.
Touch on a button that has text "Food"

After touching the button labeled "Food," two new buttons appeared on the screen, both having a content description related to photovoltaics, indicating additional options or promotions related to that category.
Touch on a button that has text "Breakfast"

After touching the button labeled "Breakfast," a new text view appears with the message "Auto fill by category," indicating that a prompt for auto-filling transactions based on the selected category has been activated. Additionally, a checkbox labeled "Ask every time" is now checked, suggesting that the user will be prompted for confirmation during future transactions.
Touch on a button that has text "YES"

The screen has transitioned from the Category Selection page to the Add New Record page, where a selected text view now displays "EXPENSE" and various buttons related to transaction details are available. The buttons and text views for categories, accounts, projects, payees, and other transaction details have been added to facilitate the entry of a new record. (page changed from CategorySelection to AddNewRecord)
Touch on a button that has text "0"

The button labeled "0" has been removed from the screen, indicating that it is no longer available for interaction. The other buttons remain unchanged, and the layout continues to display the remaining elements as before.

Jade Green has navigated through the app effectively and is currently on the Add New Record page, but has not yet entered the expense amount or completed the record. Jade Green needs to touch the button labeled "0" to enter the expense amount, and then touch the "SAVE" button to complete the task.
Touch on a button that has text "US$"

The screen now includes a new textview with the text "Tip" that provides instructions regarding adding and modifying currency content. Additionally, two new buttons labeled "DON'T REMIND" and "REMIND NEXT" have been added to the interface.
Press "BACK" button to navigate back
Touch on a button that has text "DON'T REMIND"

After touching the "DON'T REMIND" button, the screen now includes a new button with the resource_id "back" and additional text views that provide information about currency, indicating a transition to a different context within the application.
Long touch on a listview that has text "Same as account, USD, US Dollar[...and more]"
